title: Bounds on the complexity of recurrent neural network implementations of finite state machines

tldr.text: It will be shown that the node complexity for the unrestricted case can be bounded above by O (√ m ), which means that the efficiency of recurrent neural network implementations of m-state finite state machines will be explored.
